text: Biden just gave Trump a new pardon playbook  —  Joe Biden's broad reprieve for his son gives the president-elect new rationale for even more expansive pardons than those he issued in his first term.  —  In his sweeping pardon of Hunter Biden, President Joe Biden did not just protect his son.
